previewArticle.title: Colorado Rapids vs. Chivas USA | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Colorado Rapids 3, Chivas USA 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Colorado Rapids and Chivas USA meet for the second time this season when the clubs face off in a crucial Western Conference matchup on Friday evening.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Colorado Rapids vs Chivas USA | July 25, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Underway! #COLvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box.
timelineItems.title: POST: Dillon Serna sends a blistering strike off the woodwork

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Cannon accidentally fires 15 seconds into match, thoroughly scaring the crap out of 15-16,000 people

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 supporter group @C38sg making some noise from the south end of the stadium tonight

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: You’ve been warned, #Rapids96 fans at DSGP: thundershower en route. Here by end of 1st half.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Donny Toia.
Attempt missed. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Vicente Sanchez following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Poor center from Powers but terrific feed from Torres. He looks a different player.

timelineItems.name: Thor Morgan
timelineItems.text: Love it! Bold move that I think will pay huge dividends “@C38sg We are in 117, and we are ready." #Rapids96 #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Mike Casebolt
timelineItems.text: A little bit of double rainbow action at the @ColoradoRapids game vs. Chivas. #Rapids96 http://t.co/ggRvD2tzKk

timelineItems.name: Mike Casebolt
timelineItems.text: A little bit of double rainbow action at the @ColoradoRapids game vs. Chivas. #Rapids96 http://t.co/ggRvD2tzKk

timelineItems.name: MLS Live Tweets
timelineItems.text: Serna is one of my favorite young players to watch. So... Let's over hype him #nextmessi #COLvCHV #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Justin Hein
timelineItems.text: The #Rapids96 have accomplished a ton as a club the last couple years. Filling the stadium is the next step in the club's progression

timelineItems.name: Matthew Cole
timelineItems.text: Congratulations on being re-designated as a "pep club", @C38sg ! (cc: @AltitudeTV) #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Gabriel Torres.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Avila with a rabona! Pretty.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids).
Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: You might have your goal of the week here already, @MLS.

timelineItems.name: Douglass Perry
timelineItems.text: Dat golazo tho #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: And by the way, Gabriel Torres is playing like a DP tonight. Been everywhere.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Donny Toia (Chivas USA) header from the left side of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Nathan Sturgis with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Clinton Warren, PhD
timelineItems.text: Not having a sponsor on a soccer shirt always looks strange to me... and oh yea the lost revenue as well. #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Thor Morgan
timelineItems.text: INCREDIBLE goal by Labrocca. Former Chivas and Rapids players love scoring against each other #COLvCHV #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) hits the right post with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Gabriel Torres.

timelineItems.name: Nikole
timelineItems.text: "@ColoradoRapids: #Infographic: #COLvCHV Match Preview http://t.co/Q7MBeusLQK" Where is everyone? C'mon fans!

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Not gonna lie, that was a really good goal from LaBrocca.

timelineItems.name: Centennial 38
timelineItems.text:
regram @grantvdc
...it was almost a triple rainbow... wellllll let's be honest, it wasn't really that close #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Colorado Rapids 3, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Game over- #Rapids96 dominate wire-to-wire, take it 3-0. Brilliant performance.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: That's full time. You couldn't write it any better. 3-0 #Rapids96 win on Pablo Mastroeni's night

timelineItems.desc: The Colorado Rapids and Chivas USA meet for the second time this season when the clubs face off in a crucial Western Conference matchup on Friday evening.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Colorado Rapids vs Chivas USA | July 25, 2014

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: Gabriel Torres is having a great game so far, finally starting to justify his DP contract. #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: That was a great goal by Labrocca but everyone thought someone else was closing down on him. #colvchv

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 got away with leaving Cubo Torres wide open in the box there. Might want to not do that.

timelineItems.name: Dante
timelineItems.text: Let's Go!!! #Colorado #Rapids #ChivasUSA #GameDay #ColoradoRapids

timelineItems.name: Sweeney
timelineItems.text: #shamelessselfie with Another one of my favorite #rapids96 legends on #pablonight #100happydays #grrls

timelineItems.name: Salvador Fernández
timelineItems.text: Why are both Colorado and Chivas USA wearing their home kits? From behind and afar, they look similar #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: LaBrocca’s first goal since July 17 of last year

timelineItems.name: Justin Hein
timelineItems.text: It'll be nice to have Jose Mari back. Watts (to me) isn't a first team player yet. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Quick shower moving through…fingers crossed for no lightning...

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 2, Chivas USA 0. Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) header from the center of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dillon Powers.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Drew Moor flies high to power home the header

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Gabriel Torres (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Dillon Powers.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Donny Toia.

timelineItems.name: Justin Hein
timelineItems.text: Vicente Sanchez has been invisible this first half. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Jay!
timelineItems.text: Whoopsie, Drew Moor just killed the Kennedy's. #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Matthew P Ronne
timelineItems.text: Drew Moor with his trademark corner header #Rapids96 2-0 #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Francis Rivera
timelineItems.text: Moor is a cutie. #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: @CapTied96
timelineItems.text: We cried Moor Moor Moor! #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Douglass Perry
timelineItems.text: Incredible marking on that corner. That's the #ChivasUSA we all know and love. #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Thor Morgan
timelineItems.text: I'll say it again... HOW IS DREW MOOR NOT ON THE ALL-STAR SQUAD?! #Rapids96 #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Great service from Powers. Towering finish from Moor. 2-0 to @ColoradoRapids. http://t.co/Ryqsho6zVh #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: Free runs for Drew Moor on corners = goals. Colorado in firm control in Commerce City. #mls

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: well, this looks like a rout. Guess not playing all those starters was unfortunate.

timelineItems.name: Evan Kratochvíl
timelineItems.text: Spontaneously decided to go to the Rapid's game. They're making it well worth it! #COLvCHV #Rapids96 http://t.co/HfDa01zctO

timelineItems.name: Evan Kratochvíl
timelineItems.text: Spontaneously decided to go to the Rapid's game. They're making it well worth it! #COLvCHV #Rapids96 http://t.co/HfDa01zctO

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Torres absolutely sprinted after that ball- don’t believe I saw that kind of hustle in his first eight months here.

timelineItems.name: Tom
timelineItems.text: The Chivas USA summer of self-destruction is in full effect. #MLS

timelineItems.name: MLS Live Tweets
timelineItems.text: Prediction time. #ChivasUSA red card before halftime. #selfdestruct #MLS #COLvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Jared Watts has his low drive corralled by Kennedy

timelineItems.name: Taylor Sturm
timelineItems.text: Hat-trick from Drew Moor. Calling it at the 30th minute. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids).
Akira Kaji (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt saved. Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: @JosieBeckerFC BREAKING: Playing a defense that has never before started together doesn't work most of the time.

timelineItems.name: Henry Hauck
timelineItems.text: Disappointing to see so many empty seat at Dicks Sporting Goods Park on a night like this. This team is fun to watch. #COLvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Nathan Sturgis (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Nathan Sturgis catches Watts

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Eric Avila.
Foul by Nathan Sturgis (Chivas USA).
Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: Things I've learned: Marc Burch is still a starter in professional soccer #dcu #mls

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Foul by Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids).
Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Salvador Fernández
timelineItems.text: Colorado is dominating on possession 61-39. C'mon. What happened to the Chivas USA that won 4 in a row? #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: Serna looked right at the camera as he was rolling around. Then went back to grimacing. Weird. #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Henry Thomas
timelineItems.text: Wow, who's sexier in goal - @1DanKennedy or @ClintIrwin will be the subject of tonight's @mls analysis #COLvCHV @ExtraTimeRadio

timelineItems.name: Jonathon McMahon
timelineItems.text: Go Rapids! #mls #Soccer #futbol #footy #goal #summer #friday #rapids

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: So Rapids broadcast sheds light on CUSA's lineup tonight: Carlos Bocanegra has concussion, Marvin Chavez, Mauro Rosales w/ hamstring issues.

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Nathan Martin
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 tie #FCDallas for most set piece goals in MLS: 16. 53% of goals from set piece. #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Hairston prepping to come in. Looks like Watts is done.

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Watts done- looks like right ankle/shin. Watts angry with 4th ref about something, likely fouls. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Dillon Serna tries a through ball, but Vicente Sanchez is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: RMHP
timelineItems.text: The view from our booth! #doublerainbow #rapids96 #lovecolorado http://t.co/S7KoBErtLF

timelineItems.name: RMHP
timelineItems.text: The view from our booth! #doublerainbow #rapids96 #lovecolorado http://t.co/S7KoBErtLF

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: It's a right shin contusion for Watts. #Rapids96 #COLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Eriq Zavaleta.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Gabriel Torres (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Gabriel Torres fires a shot right at Kennedy

timelineItems.name: Justin Hein
timelineItems.text: Prefer Hairston in the holding mid role. Brings more creativeness to the position. More enjoyable to watch as a fan. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Gabriel Torres (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Patricia D Billinger
timelineItems.text: Cool to see a woman serving as AR at a men's @MLS match! #COLvCHV #powerfulwomen

timelineItems.name: @CapTied96
timelineItems.text: Aside from great vision, Marlon Hairston is deceptively quick. #RapKids #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: MLS Live Tweets
timelineItems.text: Felisha Mariscal is her name #previoustweet #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Eric Avila (Chivas USA).
Marc Burch (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Hand ball by Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids).
First Half ends, Colorado Rapids 2, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: HALF: Dominant opening 45, scoreline reflects #Rapids96 mastery so far. Well-taken, well-deserved goals. Best part- not a sniff for Chivas..

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: …Rapids played better defense with offense- aggressive out of the gates, hard for #Chivas to get a touch on ball. Good stuff from COL...

timelineItems.name: Richard Meyer
timelineItems.text: Beautiful night at DSGP. #Rapids96 #vscocam

timelineItems.name: Andrew
timelineItems.text: Not sure if @ColoradoRapids are that good or if @cdchivasusa is that bad, but #RAPIDS are dominating #COLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Colorado Rapids 2, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Dillon Serna sends his shot well wide of goal

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Frazzled by the cannon for the 2,562th time, the second half is underway.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Marlon Hairston.

timelineItems.name: Paul S-H
timelineItems.text: There are so few people in the crowd on camera I assumed it was a Chivas home game. #COLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA).
Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Tonight's attendance, 14,652 at @DSGpark #Rapids96 #ChivasUSA #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: @schuy1er
timelineItems.text: Not thrilled with the clash of kits in Colorado tonight #MLS #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Justin Hein
timelineItems.text: Glad Klute is back in the starting XI. He's such a sound player. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Marco Delgado.

timelineItems.name: Allison Wagstrom
timelineItems.text: Yup, @ColoradoRapids coach is my favorite of the game. Not quite Herrera levels. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Taking on the new title of Mom
timelineItems.text: Ready for more #rapids96 action! @coloradorapids #dsgp @centennial38

timelineItems.name: @schuy1er
timelineItems.text: Man Sanchez has been awful for the @ColoradoRapids Rapids tonight. Lucky for them they built am early lead and it doesn't matter. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Peter Soeth
timelineItems.text: So I'm thinking Sanchez needs some studs instead of molded boots. Losses footing to much. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: MLS Live Tweets
timelineItems.text: Every team should be required to have a white kit #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Vicente Sanchez tries a through ball, but Gabriel Torres is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: Great work by Hairston in this natch. His work as a defensive midfielder has been superb #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.desc: Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) hits the bar with a header from the center of the box.

timelineItems.name: Justin Hein
timelineItems.text: This is a solid #Rapids96 lineup right now. Should have started the match this way. Entertaining to watch.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: I'm pretty sure this group is terrible at defending set pieces.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Weldon
timelineItems.text: Good times watching #COLvCHV. #COSSBB14 #coloradorapids

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Nathan Sturgis with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Not alone MT @Eliza_Eaton: Quietly having a heart attack with all these great chances for the Rapids in the past minutes with no conversion.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Carlos Alvarez coming on

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Eriq Zavaleta.

timelineItems.name: Heather O'Neill
timelineItems.text: The #ChivasUSA defense really really really really really really really really misses Burling & Boca. Goodness Gracious, what a hot mess. �

timelineItems.name: Jesse Trujillo
timelineItems.text: Carlos Alvarez set to come in for Vicente Sanchez to face his former team for the first time since the trade earlier this month #rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Marlon Hairston (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ryan Finley (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Marco Delgado (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Clint Irwin charges out to deny a Delgado chance

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Carlos Alvarez (Colorado Rapids).
Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Marco Delgado (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Clint Irwin.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 3, Chivas USA 0. Gabriel Torres (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Carlos Alvarez.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Gabriel Torres curls a lovely shot over Kennedy

timelineItems.name: Jesse Gilmore
timelineItems.text: C'mon Torres! EIGHT STRAIGHT! #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Vincent Crow
timelineItems.text: Chivas has been giving up the ball too easily all night when on the attack in the Rapids third. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: That strike floored us too, Nick. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Matthew P Ronne
timelineItems.text: Gaby! Hope that sparks something! #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Torres curled it in from the left hand side. Then he comes off to a round of applause. Edson Buddle on. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Well-deserved goal from Torres. He's been all over the field tonight. Well done.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Cabrera's body language said it all. Four game winning streak extinguished with crushing back-to-back losses allowing 6 goals #colvchv

timelineItems.name: Alex Foster
timelineItems.text: This looks like a great time for @EdsonBuddle to get his 100th #rapids96

timelineItems.name: Rachel Sweeney
timelineItems.text: guess who's back, back again. #gabysback, tell yo friends. #rapids96 #whoompthereitis

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Nick LaBrocca.

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: I want Chivas to win, but my match prediction wants Colorado to win #mls

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Carlos Alvarez tries a through ball, but Edson Buddle is caught offside.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Chris Klute.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: John Metgod (Rapids asst. coach) in press box is the awesomest thing in the history of awesome. Constantly barking at players 250 ft away.

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: Colorado getting back to the style that brought them success in 2013 #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Derrick Blake
timelineItems.text: Had the bartender turn on #COLvCHV (Altitude), the only match on. One bar at a time. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Eriq Zavaleta.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: @Rapids_News sometimes it's like they can actually hear him.

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: After Pablo Mastroeni's night of celebration & Torres' first of the season, it feels like Buddle's 100th MLS goal is inevitable! #COLvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Chris Klute.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: If you watched Metgod right now, you’d think his team was down 3-0. Screaming, cursing. Amazing.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Matthew Dunn just had the best sequence I've seen tonight. I'm definitely biased but I don't think I'm wrong #colvchv

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Dillon Powers pushes his chance just wide

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Dillon Serna.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: In other news, Danny Mwanga’s cologne has the press box air quality at about a code orange.

timelineItems.name: Jesse Gilmore
timelineItems.text: I would have never forgiven Garber if he hadn't picked Torres for the ASG. It's hard to see him not winning MVP at this point. #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Eliza Eaton
timelineItems.text: If "I Got The Powers" isn't a chant yet, it needs to be. #justsaying #Rapids96 #onemoregoal

timelineItems.comment: Matthew Dunn (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Chris Klute (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Thor Morgan
timelineItems.text: Serna's touch continues to impress. Brought that switch ball down perfectly, with a defender on his back. Rookie's got class #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: M e l a n i e
timelineItems.text: This is summer. #rapids96 #soccer #sunsets #hotdogssss

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Colorado Rapids 3, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 2 - @cdchivasusa won the last meeting with Colorado, just their second road win in Colorado in MLS play (5D 5L). Lift. #COLvCHV

timelineItems.name: Peter Barnhardt
timelineItems.text: I think Chivas can grit out at least a draw @ Colorado. Let me down last time but I'm riding w 2u. #MLS #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Doug Young
timelineItems.text: Honoring a legend tonight, #Rapids96 player/coach Pablo Mastroeni @ColoradoRapids #COLvCHV http://t.co/QvssVV9vwy

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: Gabriel Torres starts. Not a misprint. First appearance in Colorado starting XI since May. #mls

timelineItems.name: KaEl
timelineItems.text: Stuck at home with a bad knee, I'll hold the storms on this side of town for the game. Love to Pablo and the boys!!! #Rapids96 #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Brian Mercer
timelineItems.text: Pablo mastroeni night. Go #Rapids96
